product_name: Sherpani Luna Slim Cross-Body Bag - Women's
long_description: The women's Sherpani Luna Slim Cross-Body Bag holds more than you would fit in a wallet, but is smaller than a tote. It features an original print by artist Cathy Nichols. Lightly embossed lining enhances canvas exterior and the external I.D.tag has matching artwork. Artwork is polyurethane-coated for scratch resistance. Zip-close main compartment; 1 exterior zip pocket and 1 open external pocket; internal organization pocket. Cross-body removable canvas strap with opposing side attachments ensures no-swing carrying. Sherpani Luna Slim Cross-Body Bag is made from natural-fiber, heavy cotton canvas fabric with soft vegan faux-leather trim.
short_description: The women's Sherpani Luna Slim Cross-Body Bag holds more than you would fit in a wallet, but is smaller than a tote. It features an original print by artist Cathy Nichols.
